title: Play Ball Homepage UX/UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to https://www.playball.org/
custom_steps: WHEN the page fully loads
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* Ad
* Header video
* Next featured video
* Play Ball Right column
* Trending Now section
* Video Highlights section
* Partners of Play Ball section
* Connect With Us section
* MLB Footer

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

title: Ads
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to Play Ball
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on any ads displayed in the page
custom_expected: THEN the user will be redirected to that ad's page

title: Header Video
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to Play Ball homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the video header fully loads and starts playing
custom_expected:
THEN the title of the video and brief description of it will be displayed at the bottom of the video

THEN toggling the Pause/Play button will allow the user to play and pause the video

THEN toggling the Mute/Unmute button will allow the user to mute and unmute the video

title: Next Featured Media
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to Play Ball homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls to the next media featured after the header video
custom_expected:
THEN the section will display the featured media

THEN the section will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the section to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the media type, media title, and brief description of the media will be displayed 

THEN tapping on the video or the video title will play the video and the video player will work as expected

title: Trending Now Section
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to Play Ball homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the Trending Now section loads fully
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* Title of the video
* Description
* Video thumbnail with play button in it

THEN tapping on the video from the Trending Now section or tapping on the video title will play the video and the video player will work as expected

THEN tapping on a video/video title will redirect the user to mlb.com/video/ of that video

title: Video Highlights Section
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to Play Ball homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls to the Video Highlights section
custom_expected:
THEN the section will display the following:

* 3 video highlights with play button in the thumbnail and video title below it
* More Videos link text
* 3 news articles with the title, article overview, and image/video of the article

THEN tapping on the video from the Video Highlights section or tapping on the video title will play the video and the video player will work as expected

THEN tapping on the More Videos link text will redirect the user to mlb.com/video/ Play Ball page

THEN tapping on news highlight below the Video Highlights will redirect the user to that article in mlb.com/news/

title: Partners of Play Ball Section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user scrolled to Partners of Play Ball section

As of 6/3, the sponsors are the following:

* USA Baseball
* USA Softball
* The US Conference of Mayors
* MiLB
* Little League Baseball
* Positive Coaching Alliance 
* Boys and Girls Clubs of America
* Chevrolet
* Nathan's 
* Scotts
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a partner logo
custom_expected: THEN the user will be redirected to the sponsor's page associated with the logo

title: Connect With Us Section
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user scrolled to Connect With Us section of Play Ball
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a social media icon
custom_expected: THEN the user will be redirected to the social media page associated with that icon

title: Play Ball Right Column
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to Play Ball homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the right column fully loads
custom_expected:
THEN the column will display the following: (contents from CMS)

* Slideshow of tweets
* Play Ball Newsletter opt-in
* MLB other affiliates/pages
* Ads

THEN tapping on these will redirect the user to the page associated with it

title: PB_Newsletter_Subscribe
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User should be able to subscribe for newsletter.
custom_steps:
WHEN 

- Locate First Name box and type first name
- Locate Last Name box and type last name
- Locate Email box and type a valid email
- Locate Birth Date, select a month from Month drop down menu.
- Locate to Day dropdown menu and select a day.
- Locate to Year droodown menu and select a year from drop down.
- Locate to Mobile Phone box and type a valid mobile number
- Locate to Zip Code box and a type zipcode
- Click/Check Terms Agreement
- Click/Check I am not a robot capcha
- Follow the capcha instruction  and select the valid pics
- Click on Verify button
- Click on Submit button when the capcha showing a green tick indicating the correct answer
custom_expected:
THEN

User should be able to submit for subscription.

title: PB_FOOTER (Social media links)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Following logos/links are present and working:

- Facebook
- Twitter
- Instagram
- Tumblr
- Snap
- Youtube
custom_steps:
WHEN

User should be able to locate and click/tap on the following icons:

- Facebook
- Twitter
- Instagram
- Tumblr
- Snap
- Youtube
custom_expected:
THEN

User is navigated to expected page.

title: PB_ FOOTER
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Following links should be locatable, clickable/tappable:

- MLB Logo
- Boys and Girls clubs link
- Terms of Use link
- Privacy policy link
- Legal Notices link
- Contact Us link
- Facebook icon
- Twitter icon
- Instagram icon
custom_steps:
WHEN

Locate and click/tap on following links:

- MLB Logo
- Boys and Girls clubs link
- Terms of Use link
- Privacy policy link
- Legal Notices link
- Contact Us link
- Facebook icon
- Twitter icon
- Instagram icon
custom_expected:
THEN

User should be navigated to those following pages.

title: Play Ball Logo
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user navigated to any of the Play Ball pages

GIVEN that the Play Ball header is present
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Play Ball logo
custom_expected: THEN the user will be redirected to Play Ball homepage

title: Menu 2-State Element
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to Play Ball
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Menu
custom_expected:
THEN the 2-state Menu will be activated/deactivated

THEN the activated Menu will display the following:

* Ways to Play
* Player Development
* Parent/Coach Education
* Multimedia
* Events
* Diamond Demos
* Youth Baseball/Softball Days
* Partners

THEN the menu will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the menu to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

title: Ways to Play
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the Menu is activated/extended
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps/hovers on Ways to Play
custom_expected:
THEN the following will be displayed:

* Play Ball Near You

* Fun At Bat
* MLB Pitch, Hit & Run
* Jr. Home Run Derby

THEN the wait time for the menu to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

title: Events
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the Menu is activated/extended
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Events
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to Play Ball Events page (https://www.playball.org/events)

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

THEN the page will display the following:

* Month and Year dropdowns, Filter button, and Reset link text
* Month and Year
* Date of the event, Classification of the Event, and Location of the Event
* Title of the Event, Brief Description of the Event, and More Information button
* Share Event Social Media Icons for Facebook and Twitter
* Event Classification logo (Play Ball logo for example)

THEN selecting a month and year will filter out the events displayed

THEN tapping on Reset will reset the filter and revert the page back to its original state

THEN tapping on a social media icon will open a pop for the user to share the event in that selected social media platform

THEN tapping on More Information button will redirect the user to that event's page

title: Diamond Demos
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the Menu is activated/extended
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Diamond Demos
custom_expected: THEN the user will be redirected to mlb.com/video on Diamond Demos page

title: Youth Baseball/Softball Days
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the Menu is activated/extended
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Youth Baseball/Softball Days
custom_expected: THEN the user will be redirected to MLB Litte League Days page

title: Partners
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the Menu is activated/extended
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Partners
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to Play Ball Partners page 

THEN the page will display the partner's logo and company/organization description of that partner below

title: Play Ball Near You
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the Menu is activated/extended

GIVEN the user hovered/tapped on Ways to Play
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Play Ball Near You
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* Play Ball Near You header image
* Organizations Legend
* Search for an Organization Near You section
* World map with organization legend pinned symbol in it

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN tapping on a link text with a website associated with it will redirect the user to that page

THEN tapping on an email link will redirect the user to emailing service to email that contact

THEN typing on the text field in the Search for an Organization Near You section will display a predictive list of organizations

THEN typing an organization name and clicking on Find in the Search for an Organization Near You section will filter the pinned symbol in the map and will only show the organization selected

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the map

THEN tapping on a pinned symbol in the map will display the organization information
